title.en: A Prayer Based on the Liberation Life of the Great Emanated Tertön Chokgyur Lingpa

text.en: All-pervasive luminous dharmakāya of great bliss,
text.en-trans: künkhyap dechen ösel chö kyi ku

text.en: Great indestructible sphere, the essence of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: khordé nyingpo mishik tiklé ché

text.en: Primordial protector, sovereign who is present in all things,
text.en-trans: ngöpo kün gyi khyapdak dömé gön

text.en: Noble guru, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: jetsün lamé zhap la sölwa dep

text.en: Heir to the wisdom mind of the Oḍḍiyāna Guru, the second buddha,
text.en-trans: orgyen sangyé nyipé tuk kyi sé

text.en: Universal ruler of oceanic adepts and revealers of treasure,
text.en-trans: ter jin druptop gyamtsö khorlö gyur

text.en: Guardian of the teachings and beings in this degenerate age, your liberated life beyond imagining—
text.en-trans: namtar samyé nyikdü ten drö gön

text.en: Chokgyur Lingpa, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: chokgyur lingpé zhap la sölwa dep

text.en: Although you discovered the nectar of perfect peace at the outset,
text.en-trans: döné rapzhi dütsi nyé gyur kyang

text.en: Still you arranged vast, ocean-like clouds of kāyas and pure realms,
text.en-trans: ku dang zhingkham gyamtsö trin kö dé

text.en: And with infinite nirmāṇakāyas—in art, through rebirth and supreme—
text.en-trans: zo kyé chok gi tulku tayepé

text.en: You revealed the miraculous display of fourfold training—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dül zhi chotrül tön la sölwa dep

text.en: In the Land of Snows in particular, you adopted the guise
text.en-trans: khyepar gangchen ngadak trisong jé

text.en: Of the son of Lord Tri Song and attained supreme siddhi,
text.en-trans: sé kyi tsül zung chok gi ngödrup nyé

text.en: Then manifested as Sangye Lingpa and the rest, a hundred
text.en-trans: sangyé ling sok ngotsar mejung wé

text.en: Wondrous and amazing dance-like forms—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: gyutrül gar gyé röl la sölwa dep

text.en: With pre-eminent magnanimity, you consider the beings of this degenerate age;
text.en-trans: tukkyé khyé pak nyikmé dro la gong

text.en: With pre-eminent activity, you appear according to the needs of those to be trained;
text.en-trans: trinlé khyé pak gang dül der tün tön

text.en: With a pre-eminent life of liberation, you hold an unprecedented secret treasury—
text.en-trans: namtar khyé pak ngönmé sangdzö chang

text.en: To you, the one who is pre-eminent in these three ways, I pray.
text.en-trans: khyepar sumden khyö la sölwa dep

text.en: Intentionally, you took birth in the heart of Upper Dokham,
text.en-trans: do tö sa yi tiklér samzhin du

text.en: And even in youth transcended the realm of the ordinary,
text.en-trans: kyewa zhé né zhönnü kapsu yang

text.en: As you awakened an affinity for the noble life of liberation—
text.en-trans: pelpé yül dé dampé namtar sé

text.en: To you who brought inspiration to those with faith, I pray.
text.en-trans: deden trowa kyé la sölwa dep

text.en: In your thirteenth year you met the Oḍḍiyāna Guru directly.
text.en-trans: chusum zhé tsé orgyen ngö su jel

text.en: He authorized your profound treasures and conferred his blessings.
text.en-trans: zapter jenang tsel né jin gyi lap

text.en: You received attainments, including the Prince’s sādhana supports.
text.en-trans: lhasé tukdam ten sok ngödrup top

text.en: To you, the one who brought forth treasures of the mind, I pray.
text.en-trans: gongter long né döl la sölwa dep

text.en: Without sectarian bias you followed numerous authentic masters,
text.en-trans: kar druk dri tak yapsé tsor gyurpé

text.en: Primarily from the Karma, Drukpa, Drikung and Taklung Kagyü,
text.en-trans: rimé tsemé kyé chen duma ten

text.en: Delighted them in the three ways1and imbibed the essential nectar
text.en-trans: nyepa sum gyi do ngak dütsi chü

text.en: Of sūtra and mantra into the glorious knot of your heart—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tuk kyi pel ber kyil la sölwa dep

text.en: Pema Wangchen,2an actual manifestation of Padmasambhava,
text.en-trans: pejung ngö nang pema wangchen dang

text.en: And the glorious Pawo Tsuklak Chökyi Gyalpo3both
text.en-trans: pelden pawo tsuklak chögyel gyi

text.en: Issued symbolic prophecies and entrusted you with the ultimate lineage.
text.en-trans: da yi lungten dön gyi gyüpa té

text.en: To you, the one who banished obstacles and gained accomplishment, I pray.
text.en-trans: gek sel ngödrup nyé la sölwa dep

text.en: Through activating your master-disciple connection
text.en-trans: khyepar jam gön khyentsé wangpo dang

text.en: With the gentle lord Khyentse Wangpo in particular,
text.en-trans: yapsé drelwé lé kyi tro sé né

text.en: Your minds merged as one, and you unlocked a hundred doors
text.en-trans: tuk yi chik dré ngotsar tendrel gyi

text.en: Of wondrous interdependent connection—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: gopar gyatrak ché la sölwa dep

text.en: To the faultless wisdom-vision you gained at birth
text.en-trans: kyewé toppé drimé yeshé chen

text.en: No dharma, provisional or definitive, was concealed,
text.en-trans: drang ngé chö la kok tu magyurwé

text.en: And with the full strength of twofold wisdom, you outshone
text.en-trans: khé dang druppar lom kün zil nönpé

text.en: All who considered themselves learned or accomplished—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khyen nyi tsel chen dzok la sölwa dep

text.en: At the earthly centre of enlightened speech4and elsewhere,
text.en-trans: sachö sung gi khorlo lasokpar

text.en: You completed the yogas of generation, perfection and Great Perfection,
text.en-trans: kyedzok dzogchen neljor tarchin té

text.en: Destroyed delusion and gained proficiency in the four types of activity,5
text.en-trans: trülpa zhik ching lé zhir rangwang jor

text.en: To you, an ornament upon the crowns of adepts, I pray.
text.en-trans: druppé tsukgyen gyur la sölwa dep

text.en: In pure visions you often travelled to the realm of Lotus Light,
text.en-trans: dakpé nangwar pema ö zhing du

text.en: Where you practised fourfold approach and accomplishment6
text.en-trans: yangyang pep né lama ku sum dang

text.en: Together with the three-kāya Guru and hosts of disciples,
text.en-trans: jebang tsok ché nyendrup nam zhi dzé

text.en: And received empowerments and prophecies—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: wangkur lungten top la sölwa dep

text.en: You beheld countless victors, their heirs and yidam deities,
text.en-trans: gyelwa sé ché yidam pakmé zik

text.en: And participated in feast gatherings together with ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: khandro nam dang tsok kyi duwar röl

text.en: While oath-bound treasure guardians and virtuous protectors
text.en-trans: damchen tersung karchok kyong nam kyi

text.en: Carried out whatever actions you commanded—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: chi chöl ka zhin drup la sölwa dep

text.en: The Three Cycles of the Guru, peaceful and wrathful sādhanas,
text.en-trans: lama korsum drupdé zhi dang tro

text.en: TheUnion,Scripture,Illusion,Three Sections of the Great Perfection, and more—
text.en-trans: nyamjor do gyu dzogchen dé sum sok

text.en: To you, the one who revealed a vast treasury of Dharma jewels,
text.en-trans: ngönché sateng majön chö ten gyi

text.en: The likes of which had not been seen before upon this earth, I pray.
text.en-trans: norbü dzö chen chung la sölwa dep

text.en: You directly encountered a hundred supremely sacred places,
text.en-trans: dokham né chen nyernga tsor gyurpé

text.en: With the twenty-five major sites of Dokham foremost among them.
text.en-trans: né chok gya tsé zhelré ngö gyü né

text.en: You are the one who brought them all to light—
text.en-trans: nangwar dzé ching kyegu tayepa

text.en: Great captain guiding infinite beings to liberation, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tarpé khalo gyur la sölwa dep

text.en: The great teachers of every tradition without sectarian bias,
text.en-trans: kar druk yapsé ngagyur tendzin chok

text.en: Especially the glorious protectors of the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: gangchen pelgön nam kyi tsor dzepé

text.en: The fathers and sons of the Karma and Drukpa and supreme holders of the Ancient Translations teachings,
text.en-trans: rimé kyé chen kün gyi zhap la tü

text.en: All bowed down before your feet—master of masters, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lamé lamar gyur la sölwa dep

text.en: As foretold in the vajra prophecies of the Oḍḍiyāna Guru,
text.en-trans: orgyen dorjé lung gi ngakpa yi

text.en: Ten principal custodians of your teachings took the lead
text.en-trans: tsawé chödak nam chü tok drang té

text.en: In extending the sphere of your profound treasury activity
text.en-trans: ngari wütsang dokham ta wü su

text.en: Throughout the whole of Ngari, Ü, Tsang and Dokham—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: zapter trinlé pel la sölwa dep

text.en: You showered down a rain of vajra blessings upon supremely sacred places,
text.en-trans: né chok nam la dorjé jin chen pap

text.en: Suppressed the eight classes of spirits and demons, and conferred magnificence.
text.en-trans: dé gyé jungpor ka nen rap ji tsel

text.en: Everywhere throughout the land you arranged outer and inner auspiciousness,
text.en-trans: sa né küntu chinang tendrel drik

text.en: And averted the misfortune of this degenerate age—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: nyikmé kel ngen dok la sölwa dep

text.en: You bestowed common and uncommon empowerments and instructions,
text.en-trans: tünmong tünmong minpé mindröl dang

text.en: Performed grand accomplishment rites and dances, granted liberation upon taste,
text.en-trans: drupchen gar cham nyongdröl jinpa sok

text.en: And in these and other ways, you impartially benefitted countless beings.
text.en-trans: chokmé tselpé kyegu drangmepa

text.en: To you who made every connection a meaningful one, I pray.
text.en-trans: dreltsé dönden dzé la sölwa dep

text.en: To encourage virtue among those who might cling to permanence,
text.en-trans: tak dzinchen nam gé la külwa dang

text.en: And since you perceived another mission of vast significance,
text.en-trans: dön chok gyachen zhen la zik né kyang

text.en: You departed, together with miracles perceived by the fortunate,
text.en-trans: kelden nang ngor chotrül dumar ché

text.en: For the realm of Lotus Light—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: pema ö du shek la sölwa dep

text.en: In the pure realm that is Wholly Covered in Lotuses,
text.en-trans: pemé yongsu kheppé zhingkham su

text.en: You are the supreme son of the victorious one Rays of Lotus Light,
text.en-trans: pemé özer gyelwé sé chok ni

text.en: Who displays infinite emanations throughout the ten directions,
text.en-trans: pemé nyugu lasok chok chu na

text.en: Including one called Lotus Essence—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: namtrül tayé tön la sölwa dep

text.en: Confer the blessings of enlightened body, speech and mind
text.en-trans: go sum güpé söldep bu nam la

text.en: Upon your heirs, who pray with devotion of the three doors.
text.en-trans: ku sung tuk kyi jinlap tsölwa dang

text.en: Guide and care for us inseparably in all our lives to come,
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu drelmé jezung né

text.en: And lead us to the supreme of pure realms, we pray.
text.en-trans: dakpé zhingkham chok tu drang du söl

text.en: Pacify all circumstances that hinder our attainment of awakening,
text.en-trans: jangchup druppé gelkyen kün zhi zhing

text.en: Cause short-term aspirations to be fulfilled according to the Dharma,
text.en-trans: nekap samdön chö zhin druppa dang

text.en: Help us to traverse with ease the four stages of the vidyādharas,
text.en-trans: rigdzin nam zhi gopang delak drö

text.en: And ultimately attain the state of the Vajrasattva of Great Bliss.
text.en-trans: tartuk dechen dorjé sem drup shok

text.en: May the profound treasure teachings spread throughout this world,
text.en-trans: zapter tenpa dzamling küntu khyap

text.en: May the sublime masters who uphold them live for a hundred aeons,
text.en-trans: dé dzin kyechok kutsé kel gyar ten

text.en: And may the virtuous excellence of this constant, far-reaching activity
text.en-trans: trinlé tak ching khyappé gelek kyi

text.en: Cause the sun of auspiciousness to shine throughout the three worlds.
text.en-trans: tashi nyimé sa sum nang gyur chik
